smalani530.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • smalani530.shapes.Shape
      • smalani530.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    This class represents a Line. It can draw a line and contains methods to check if lines intersect
    Version:
    9/27/2018
    Author:
    Sean Malani

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Line object
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet to be used to draw the line
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate setting should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its strokeWeight set to getStrokeWeight()

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        Checks if two lines are intersecting, does not work for parallel lines on top of each other
        Parameters:
        other - other line which is being cross checked with Line object
        Returns:
        true if both lines intersect
